data.title: Elbow to B Site Retake Recon Bolt
data.description: When retaking the B Site, use this dart to assist your teammates at spawn. This will scan everyone on site, besides Attackers in tube.

data.title: B Hall To B Fountain Recon Bolt
data.description: This is a quick and easy to set up Recon Bolt from B Hall for B Fountain / B Long.

data.title: A Lamps To A Site Retake Recon Bolt
data.description: This Recon Bolt lineup is useful for revealing players in most of the area in front of the truck on A Site, as well as a good chunk of B Short, and can potentially reveal players in spots that can be wallbanged with a heavy bullet penetration weapon through the front Lamps wall as well.

data.title: B Site To B Short Recon Bolt
data.description: This Recon Bolt lineup is useful for revealing players in the majority of B Short.
